title: Mamma Mia
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cozy Italian trattoria near the main market square. Offers pizza, pasta, salads. Could ask for pizza with veggies and omit cheese. A few of the salads can be made vegan. The soups are cooked with vegetable stock; the gazpacho and cream of tomato are vegan suitable. Penne pomodorro and arrabiata are vegan when omit cheese. As for appetizers, bruschetta and focaccias are vegan as is the spinach and garlic.
